sentences.en: A memorial service is being held for her at St. Paul's Church.
sentences.cn: 一场为她举行的纪念仪式正在圣保罗教堂举行。

sentences.en: A memorial service was held yesterday at Wadhurst Parish Church. The Rev Michael Inch officiated.
sentences.cn: 昨天，悼念仪式在沃德赫斯特堂区教堂举行，迈克尔·英奇牧师担任主持。

sentences.en: A memorial service will be held at 7 pm on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 周六晚上七时将举行追悼仪式。
不同宗教团体参加的追悼仪式

sentences.en: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream.
sentences.cn: 为哥伦布建一座纪念碑是他一生的梦想。

sentences.en: Dear Madam, Thank you for your interest in our Memorial Scheme.
sentences.cn: 尊敬的女士，感谢您对我们的纪念方案的关注。

sentences.en: Friends gathered at a memorial for the late statesman.
sentences.cn: 这位已故政治家的生前好友为他举行了纪念仪式.

sentences.en: He wrote a memorial of the late author.
sentences.cn: 他写了一篇纪念这位已故作家的文章.

sentences.en: More than fifteen thousand people took part in the memorial service.
sentences.cn: 有15,000多人参加了悼念仪式。

sentences.en: The city's rather uncompromising bleakness is a permanent memorial to its dark and mysterious founders.
sentences.cn: 这座城市毫不妥协的荒凉面貌是对其神秘莫测的创建者的永久纪念。

sentences.en: The garden is a memorial to one of the finest Victorian gardeners.
sentences.cn: 这座花园是对维多利亚时期一位最优秀的园艺家的纪念。

sentences.en: The hospital was built as a memorial to King Edward VII.
sentences.cn: 该医院是为了纪念国王爱德华七世而建的。

sentences.en: The Memorial seems almost ugly, dominating the landscape for miles around.
sentences.cn: 那座纪念碑耸立在方圆数英里景致之中显得近乎难看。

sentences.en: The Queen laid a poppy wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 女王向阵亡将士纪念碑献了罂粟花圈.

sentences.en: The Queen laid a wreath at the war memorial.
sentences.cn: 女王向阵亡将士纪念碑献了花圈。

sentences.en: The war memorial stands upright in the square.
sentences.cn: 战争纪念碑矗立在广场上.

sentences.en: This memorial stands on sacred ground.
sentences.cn: 这块纪念碑屹立于圣地之上。

sentences.en: This was not a memorial service but a celebration of his life.
sentences.cn: 这不是在开追悼会，而是在颂扬他的一生。
我们参观了林肯纪念堂.

words.tran_cn: 显著的，难忘的；值得纪念的
纪念品，引起回忆的东西
大事记；值得纪念的事物
记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆
记忆的；[建]纪念的，追悼的
备忘录,节略,请愿书,告诫

trans.tran_en: done or made in order to remind people of someone who has died
something, especially a stone with writing on it, that reminds people of someone who has died
